scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace=subgraphs/locations" "npm run start --workspace=subgraphs/speakers" "npm run start --workspace=subgraphs/sessions" "npm run start --workspace=subgraphs/ratings"
scripts.check:locations: wgc subgraph check locations --schema subgraphs/locations/schema.graphql --label project=apidays
scripts.check:speakers: wgc subgraph check speakers --schema subgraphs/speakers/schema.graphql --label project=apidays
scripts.check:sessions: wgc subgraph check sessions --schema subgraphs/sessions/schema.graphql --label project=apidays
scripts.check:ratings: wgc subgraph check ratings --schema subgraphs/ratings/schema.graphql --label project=apidays
scripts.check:all: pnpm check:locations && pnpm check:speakers && pnpm check:sessions && pnpm check:ratings
scripts.publish:locations: wgc subgraph publish locations --schema subgraphs/locations/schema.graphql --label project=apidays --routing-url http://localhost:5001/graphql
scripts.publish:speakers: wgc subgraph publish speakers --schema subgraphs/speakers/schema.graphql --label project=apidays --routing-url http://localhost:5002/graphql
scripts.publish:sessions: wgc subgraph publish sessions --schema subgraphs/sessions/schema.graphql --label project=apidays --routing-url http://localhost:5003/graphql
scripts.publish:ratings: wgc subgraph publish ratings --schema subgraphs/ratings/schema.graphql --label project=apidays --routing-url http://localhost:5004/graphql
scripts.publish:all: pnpm publish:locations && pnpm publish:speakers && pnpm publish:sessions && pnpm publish:ratings
scripts.router: docker run --name cosmo-router --rm -p 3002:3002 --add-host=host.docker.internal:host-gateway --pull always --env-file .env -e DEV_MODE=true -e DEMO_MODE=true -e LISTEN_ADDR=0.0.0.0:3002 ghcr.io/wundergraph/cosmo/router:latest
